SearchRandomAsync()

Searches for a Book using a random Id.

Declaration
Task<Book> SearchRandomAsync()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Book>

A random Book.
Remarks

This method currently does not support excluding tags. It is your responsibility to filter out Books that contain unwanted tags on retrieval.
